articles.author: Sander Lutz
articles.description: The Dencun upgrade has made gas fees on many Ethereum layer-2 networks near-zero. But it has yet to peel users away from the costly mainnet.
articles.title: How Much Has the Ethereum Dencun Upgrade Cut Layer-2 Gas Fees?

articles.description: Avalanche first-person shooter Shrapnel just expanded its early access game with in-game skins as a big competition kicks off.

articles.description: The Ethereum Foundation received a "voluntary enquiry from a state authority that included a requirement for confidentiality."
articles.title: Ethereum Foundation Being Investigated by 'State Authority'

articles.author: gamingwire
articles.description: Zug, Switzerland, March 20th, 2024, GamingWire   Playnance, a web3 leader in the peer-to-peer play-to-earn gaming category accounting for up to 10% of total Polygon POS transactions, today announced the launch of PlayBlock, a gaming Layer-3 ecosystem powered by Arbitrum Orbit, on Gelato’s Rollup-as-a-Service (RaaS) Platform. PlayBlock, a new Orbit Layer-3, is poised to onboard […]
articles.title: Future of Gaming: Playnance Introduces PlayBlock Layer-3 on Arbitrum with Gelato RaaS

articles.author: Jason Nelson
articles.description: UPDATED: Assassin's Creed maker Ubisoft just showcased how generative AI can power more believable NPCs. Here's how.
articles.title: How Ubisoft, Xbox, and Blizzard Are Using AI to Make Next-Generation Games

articles.description: The Ethereum gaming network on Arbitrum has linked up with indie curator The MIX, which says it has a flood of games lined up.
articles.title: Ethereum Gaming Network Xai Could Add 100+ Games in 2024—Here's How

articles.description: Grayscale has submitted a proposal to stake—and therefore earn rewards on—the Ethereum held by to back shares of its ETHE fund.

articles.description: Investors are still cashing out of GBTC. Does this indicate diminished demand for spot Bitcoin ETFs?
articles.title: Bitcoin ETFs Lose Ground for First Time in Weeks, Weighed Down by Grayscale

articles.title: BlackRock Creates Tokenized Asset Fund, SEC Filing Shows

articles.description: Ethereum ETFs may perform better if launched after the hype around Bitcoin ETFs fades.

articles.description: The increasingly prevalent practice, fueled by meme coin FOMO, is incredibly risky and already drawing red flags due to legal and ethical questions.
articles.title: Solana Meme Coin Presales Have Raised $150 Million—What Could Go Wrong?

articles.description: After days of gains, buzzy Solana meme coins like BOME and SLERF shed substantial value following a Bitcoin flash crash.

articles.description: Solana DEX Jupiter said it "will be donating current and ongoing SLERF limit order & DCA fees to the SLERF presale participants."
articles.title: Jupiter Founder Says DEX Will Donate Fees to Slerf Presale Buyers

articles.description: Bitcoin rebounds as users withdraw funds from exchanges. Solana breaks $200, surpassing Binance Coin to claim the 4th spot in crypto rankings. Ethereum's supply drops to a two-year low. Over $100 million raised by new coin presales in just two days. A dog NFT sells for a staggering $4.3 million. PRIME emerges as the leader in gaming coins, while NodeMonkes flips Bored Ape Yacht Club (BAYC).
articles.title: The Weekend Madness

articles.author: Ryan Kawailani Ozawa
articles.description: Even as he awaits sentencing in federal court, CZ announces "the most impactful thing I could do for the next chapter of my life."
articles.title: Embattled Binance Founder Changpeng Zhao Launches ‘Giggle Academy’

articles.author: Jason Nelson
articles.description: CEO Jensen Huang showed off the "very, very big" Blackwell AI GPU and real-world AI use cases from Mercedes and Siemens.
articles.title: NVIDIA Unveils Project Gr00t for Robotic AI, Apple Vision Pro Integration

articles.author: Mathew Di Salvo
articles.description: Spot Ethereum ETFs should get the green light by May, and the bank says the asset will only go up from there.
articles.title: Ethereum Could Top $14,000 Next Year Alongside Bitcoin Boom: Standard Chartered

articles.author: Jose Antonio Lanz
articles.description: In his new book, Ver claims Bitcoin was “hijacked” and corrupted—Back says Ver should let it go and return to BTC.
articles.title: Adam Back Wants ‘Prodigal Son’ Roger Ver to Come Home to Bitcoin

articles.description: BTC experiences a 9% drop, resulting in $700 million liquidations, with funding and open interest hitting their lowest levels in weeks. The sell-off appears more sustained compared to previous brief dips, with most BTC downside liquidations concentrated around $66,000. ETFs witness $132 million inflows, sparking predictions of a potential liquidity crisis within six months. VanEck suggests that an ETH ETF could surpass BTC in size. Grayscale's ETH discount doubles within a week. Meanwhile, SOL's market cap reaches an all-time high amid a frenzy surrounding memecoins. Additionally, rumors circulate about a fund losing $1 billion on the BTC-MicroStrategy basis.
articles.title: BOME Blast off

articles.description: ETFs match last week’s inflows in just 3 days. ETH Dencun upgrade goes, ETH coins broadly fall. ETH L2 costs for trading decrease dramatically. SOL nears $100bn FDV as activity soars. SOL DEX volume now 3x ETH mainnet. MicroStrategy plans $500m raise to buy more BTC. Franklin Templeton releases memecoin paper. AEVO faces FUD about tokenomics.
articles.title: This is The Time of SOL

articles.description: Bitcoin hits a new high at $73.1k with a 2% increase, while Ethereum remains steady at $4050 and Solana sees a similar surge to $154. TON, RBN, RUNE, and QNT emerge as top gainers, capturing market attention. BTC's unprecedented rise is fueled by a record $1 billion in ETF inflows, coinciding with Ethereum's Dencun upgrade promising significant changes for Layer 2 solutions.
articles.title: Bitcoin Hits ATH Again

articles.description: Bitcoin (BTC) at $72k and Ethereum (ETH) at $4035, both up 1%. Solana (SOL) rises 3% to $152. Leading gains: TON, XRP, IOTA, FLOW. Bitcoin nears record high with significant ETF investments. Solana sees spike in new users. TON surges 30% with Telegram IPO rumors. Ark Invest offloads $69m in Coinbase stock. Predictions: Bitcoin could outdo gold, potentially reaching $150k. Blast platform's value hits $3bn with higher yields. Biden proposes crypto miner tax. El Salvador profits $84m from Bitcoin. Monad plans $200m raise led by Paradigm.
articles.title: CPI COMES IN, BTC HOLDS 72

articles.description: BTC hits new ATH of $72k, flips Silver market cap. Wick lower then higher causes $350m liquidations. London Stock Exchange to consider crypto ETNs. Funding again soars before ETF buying begins. Crypto saw record $2.7bn inflows last week. MicroStrategy buys another $821m of BTC.
articles.title: BITCOIN HITS $72,000!

articles.description: ETF net inflows hit $472m in strong week. GBTC outflows hit $10bn, nearly overtaken by new 9. BlackRock to allow more funds to buy BTC ETFs. Rumours still of Qatar buying amid Bukele meeting.
articles.title: BTC HITS 70K!

articles.description: SOL up 10%, Pantera raising $250m to buy from FTX. Market flat but spot buyers begin to drive volumes.
articles.title: Live With Raoul Pal

articles.description: Discover how to navigate and overcome the complexities of blockchain data management with QuickNode’s Streams. This webinar, guided by our seasoned experts Nick Yushkevich and Carl DiClementi, provides you with actionable insights into tackling common challenges faced by businesses in the blockchain space. From real-time data streaming that ensures timely decision-making to robust error handling mechanisms that guarantee data integrity, and comprehensive observability features that offer deep insights into your blockchain operations, we’ll cover how QuickNode’s infrastructure is tailored to enhance operational efficiency, scalability, and innovation.
articles.title: Streamlining Blockchain: Demystifying Real-Time Insights & Simplifying Data Management

articles.description: ETFs see another $562m net inflow. Fear & Greed hits 90, was above for months in 2021. ETH leads majors, beta-plays take lead in altcoins. BlackRock to start buying BTC in its largest fund. MicroStrategy plans $600m capital raise to buy BTC. BTC flips market cap of Silver. WIF to be listed on Binance, rises 20%. PEPE & WIF mentioned on Bloomberg. Alien Punk sells for $16m, ‘NFTs not dead’. 3 more large NFT sales for $500K.
articles.title: DOGS ON TOP!

articles.description: Pixels founder Luke Barwikowski joins Decrypt's Andrew Hayward to discuss how the Ronin-based farming game will be transformed through the addition of guilds and changes to resource generation. They also discuss his ultimate vision for Pixels and his team. Note: This interview was recorded shortly before the PIXEL token launch.
articles.title: Interview: How SocialFi Will Transform Crypto Farming Game 'Pixels'

articles.description: Rug Radio creator Orangie checked out the limited-time "Apes Come Home" event in Otherside, the Bored Ape metaverse game, and got to use his own Ape avatar. Was it worth the $75K he spent for the NFT? Check out his impressions of the experience.
articles.title: Orangie Plays the 'Otherside' Apes Come Home Game Event With His Bored Ape

articles.description: Following the launch of decentralized media publishing company DASTAN, its President Farokh Sarmad, CEO Loxley Fernandes, and COO Quinn Button, Ph. D joined Decrypt reporter Sander Lutz and The Nifty & BoDoggos Founder and Partner Easy to talk about the future of media.
articles.title: 'This is the Age of Creators': How DASTAN is Fixing the 'Broken' Media Industry

articles.description: Saro McKenna, Co-Founder of Alien Worlds, Linda Ang, Head of Strategy at Aelf, and Sami Chlagou, CEO of Cross the Ages joined Stephen Graves at NFT Paris to explore the profile of the Web3 gamer, the evolving landscape of Web3 gaming and the transition between Web2 and Web3 gaming.
articles.title: Inside The Mind Of a Web3 Gamer

articles.description: Casper Network's Director of Ecosystem Alizee Carli and Head of Content Joe Benso join Stephen Graves at NFT Paris to talk about how the Layer 1 blockchain is expanding beyond its enterprise user base to Web3-native projects.
articles.title: Casper Network: Opening a 'New World of Possibilities' Beyond Enterprise Users

articles.description: VanEck's Head of NFT Community and Web3, Matt Bartlett, joined Stephen Graves at NFT Paris to discuss the launch of its new NFT platform Segment.io, and the need for regulatory clarity in the NFT space.
articles.title: VanEck Web3 Lead: Tokenized Real Estate the 'Holy Grail'

articles.description: Rug Radio creator Orangie shares a first look at an early version of Dookey Dash: Unclogged, the new free-to-play version of 2023's crypto gaming sensation. Yuga Labs is releasing the new version of the game this spring with over $1 million in prizes up for grabs.
articles.title: Orangie Plays 'Dookey Dash: Unclogged,' the Bored Ape Game With Over $1 Million in Prizes

articles.description: Chiliz Chief Strategy Officer Max Rabinovitch joined Decrypt's Stephen Graves at NFT Paris to discuss Paris Saint-Germain FC joining its network as a validator, and how consequential Web3 adoption in sport will come from the grassroots.
articles.title: How Paris Saint-Germain FC Joined Chiliz as a Validator

articles.description: Sébastien Borget, COO and co-founder of The Sandbox, joined Decrypt's Stephen Graves at NFT Paris to talk about the metaverse platform's launch of user-generated content, AI in gaming, and open metaverse standards.
articles.title: The Sandbox Co-Founder Sébastien Borget: 'The Future of Gaming is User-Generated Content'

articles.description: Miguel Faus, director of NFT-funded feature film "Calladita," joined Decrypt's Stephen Graves at NFT Paris to talk about the film's recent premiere and how the "radically independent" decentralized Film3 movement is evolving.
articles.title: 'Calladita' Director Miguel Faus: How Web3 Filmmaking is 'Taking the Castle'
